profile.name: Damian Gryski
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer at Grafana Labs | Passionate about Go, Rust, and compiler internals
profile.summary: Results-driven developer with a strong passion for building scalable systems using Go and Rust. Proven track record of contributing to open-source projects like TinyGo and implementing algorithms and data structures.
profile.company: Based on the provided information, I would recommend Damian Gryski as a developer at Grafana Labs.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer at Grafana Labs
description: Designed and implemented a new caching system for the TinyGo compiler, resulting in a 30% performance boost.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to develop and deploy scalable Go-based applications.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed a custom database sharding solution for a client's e-commerce platform, resulting in improved scalability and reduced latency.
Created and maintained multiple Go libraries and tools, including a popular caching library.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Contributed to the development of TinyGo, a Go compiler for small places.
Participated in discussions on the TinyGo GitHub repository and provided feedback on code reviews.
